## Legend

```{r icontibble, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
faread <-  as.character(fa("book", fill = "#74d86f", height = "17px"))
famaterials <-  as.character(fa("chalkboard", fill = "#a484d3", height = "17px"))
fatraining <-  as.character(fa("r-project", fill = "#6cb3dc", height = "17px"))
fatasks <- as.character(fa("tasks", fill = "#d86f74", height = "17px"))
fadue <- as.character(fa("folder-open", fill = "#6fd8d3", height = "17px"))


tableofcontent <- tibble(
  
  type <- c("Readings", 
            "Materials",
            "Training",
            "Tasks",
            "To Do"),
  
  location <- c("<a href='/readings/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/materials/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/training/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/tasks/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/due/'>Go</a>"),
  
  icon <- c(faread,
            famaterials,
            fatraining,
            fatasks,
            fadue),
  
  descr <- c("Weekly readings",
             "Course items and other required content",
             "R Training modules",
             "Weekly tasks and deliverables",
             "Weekly submission information"
             ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"

  ) 
```
